proposal: Diving into the world of decentralized GPU computing, oGPU is reshaping AI research and graphics processing on a global scale. With 483 holders in the ETH network, congrats on fueling the future of scalable, efficient tech! Our toolkit, from DEX creation to DAO governance, aligns perfectly with your vision, empowering your community to not just participate but innovate. Let's enhance the oGPU ecosystem together, one block at a time.
